Package arjuna.JavaSim.Statistics

Class Summary
Bucket  
Histogram This histogram class maintains a fixed number of buckets.
Mean  
PrecisionHistogram This is the base histogram class which keeps an exact tally of all values input, i.e., a bucket is created for each new value.
Quantile Provides a means of obtaining the p-quantile of a distribution, i.e., the value below which p-percent of the distribution lies.
SimpleHistogram A simple histogram with a set number of buckets.
TimeVariance Obtain the average value given during the simulation time.
Variance Used to obtain the variance of the samples given.
 

Exception Summary
StatisticsException General exception thrown by the statistics gathering classes.
